title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 86.2 - Manufacturer's gratis merchandise and payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 86.2 - Manufacturer's gratis merchandise and payments

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 485(a)(2)

Any merchandise given gratis or any payment made to an
agent, to a CMSA wholesale dealer or to a CMSA retail dealer by a manufacturer
of cigarettes for display, advertising, promotional purposes or otherwise, is
not a trade discount nor shall they be considered in determining the cost of
the agent, the cost of the CMSA wholesale dealer or the cost of the CMSA retail
dealer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
86.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
